title: Pirate

fields.name: - Rapier (4 uses, 1 round cooldown):
fields.value: Guess the **Obsessed**. If guessed correctly, take their __Treasure__, apply **Ethereal** to it, and give 8 **Card Shards** to them. If guessed incorrectly, gain 2 **Card Shards**. There will be a __Treasure__ card forever in play and you cannot choose targets of cards until you have no uses of this ability.

fields.name: - Scout (1 use, 1 round cooldown):
fields.value: Check a player. If they have the __Treasure__ card, learn that they have it. If not, learn 2 random cards in their hand that are not **Phantom** or **Ethereal**. This gains a use every 3 cards with <:yellow:1106234135384699023> or <:wild:1106237191388143838> coloring you play.
